titleStmt.title: Receipt for Sale of Wine on delivery
titleStmt.author: Aurelius Georgios son of Enoch

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (Cross) In [the name of the Lord and] Master, Jesus Christus, our God and Saviour, Choiak 10 (plus) of the 11th indiction. To the venerable Theodoros, notary of the illustrious house, son of Phoibammon of blessed memory, of the city of Oxyrhynchus, from Aurelius Georgios, son of Enoch and Eous of the estate of Tarouthinas the Great in the Oxyrhynchite nome. I acknowledge that I have received from you now immediately six gold solidi minus two keratia, and I acknowledge that in exchange for these I will give her five hundred and fifteen five-sextarii jars of wine in the vintage of the month Mesore of the present eleventh indiction from the wine vintage of the D.V. twelfth indiction [- - -]

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, PMich XV, 743, 1982, Pl XXVIII -- BL IX 163 on lines 19-20.; ZPE 150, 198
